note: Reported hashrate on the network is {{totalHash}}. 50% of reported hashrate is accounted for by proof-of-stake. Mobile phone average mining hashrate is 3 MH/s. High-end CPU average mining hashrate is 30 MH/s. Updates every 15 minutes.

economic.heading: Earn from economic activity.
economic.text: Besides coinbase rewards, miners and stakers earn on fees paid to the protocol.

banner.heading: A green mining revolution.
banner.text: In the Verus multichain protocol you can mine up to 22 blockchains on one device. With the same hashrate. Boosting your mining efficiency and profits to great heights.

defi.heading: DeFi conversions.
defi.text: If you hold DeFi tokens, you indirectly earn fees. When conversions happen between its reserves, a 0.025% fee stays in the token, giving it a higher value.

referral.heading: VerusID referrals.
referral.text: Receive 20 VRSC for each identity created with your VerusID as referral. This referral system goes three levels down. So you can earn up to 60 VRSC.
